oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Don Klein Oral History Interview, 2011 February 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Don Klein conducted on February 22, 2011 by Andrea Blackman as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Topics discussed include volunteerism of Nashville citizens, coping with disaster, flood insurance, FEMA, volunteerism of Nashville schools, and the Bellevue neighborhood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
